text: She has been honoured with several prestigious accolades throughout her career. But after gifting one of her Emmy Awards to daughter Sunday, 10, Nicole Kidman was surprisingly rejected. On Tuesday, the 51 - year - old actress revealed her sassy youngster simply'didn't want'the award.'I want to earn my own': Nicole Kidman revealed she was snubbed by her daughter Sunday, 10, after gifting her an Emmy Award. Pictured at the Emmy Awards in Los Angeles, 2017 Making an appearance on Jimmy Kimmel Live, Nicole recalled :'Actually I offered when I won the Emmy for Big Little Lies... I won one for producing and one for acting which was an incredible thing to happen.'I was like okay, I can put one on your shelf, Sunday,
